settings.menuHTML:
How to play

Summon hostile monsters to collect treasures and weapons. Become the strongest fighter by exploring the environment and the best strategies!

Basic Controls

W, A, S, D to move. G and E to drop and pick up items. Z to confirm actions. P to spectate. R to split items. C to auto use shovel. Enter to chat with players.
<%- playForm %>


Latest Update: new coal and boros' statue

Let us know about your experience
Fight with style




Log in to collect coins, unlock new skins, add friends, and much more!
Latest Version 1.0.3  |  More IO games  |  Discord  |  Support me

KjPSJd2hBB.name: Welcome player
KjPSJd2hBB.message:
Hi! Welcome to the main island! Check out some tips!



Combat basics: both short melee and long melee weapons hit several enemies at once. Long-range items deal more damage but only for the target monster.

Item descriptions: when you collect a chest you have to wait a few minutes before opening it. Place the mouse cursor over any item in your inventory to see more information.

Tough enemies: ghosts and flying monsters require specific weapons to be defeated. Try collecting different kinds of items. Modify resources to advance in the game.

Hunger and health: be careful with your hunger bar. You can lose your regeneration or even starve. Always try to carry some food in your backpack, located at the bottom right of your screen.

Experience and levels: earn experience to increase your force by defeating monsters and exploring the game. You can find different rarities of monsters and items.

Game progress: each time you exit the game, your stuff will be saved and reloaded when you log in. Explore and try to discover all the secrets! Stay tuned, and enjoy the game!

options.name: Shut up! Let me play the game!

UCEX3UGeug.name: Welcome veteran 1
UCEX3UGeug.message:
Hi, veteran! Welcome back to the main island!



Join my discord server (menu)! Liking the game? Don't forget to take a look at my Patreon page! Help me to continue this project earning unique rewards! Click Here


Game tip: You can always press [H] to open the game basics.

options.name: Shut up! Let me play the game!

CRqjQf0tho.name: Shaggy
CRqjQf0tho.message:
You are talking to the statue of luck!



Better known as the statue of Shaggy, turned into stone after being defeated by the protectors of the treasure island. Each use costs 25 amethyst. Possible results:


Super lucky: 55% chance of winning 1 extra level.

Not the worst: 40% chance of losing 1 level.

The most unlucky: 05% chance of losing all your levels.



Warning: The statue of luck is also known for scamming players that try to gamble all their levels! Never risk your hard work!



Useful information: Drinking luck potions will increase your chances of winning levels!

options.name: I want to get out of here! Shaggy is not trustable!

ytaMcgx153.name: Kicked user
ytaMcgx153.message:
Your fighter got kicked for user inactivity!



Game tip: Next time try to create an account for saving your data. It will also prevent this from happening.

HWOoIyJKn5.name: Shrek
HWOoIyJKn5.message:
You are talking to the statue of Shrek!



Better known as the statue of experience. Use it wisely in order to get the best blessings.

k1fPUBTPJv.name: Original fighter
k1fPUBTPJv.message:
I am the original fighter



I was the first to set foot on this magic island. I banished all monsters from the main island to an alternate dimension, the same dimension you use to summon creatures full of powerful items. When I tried to leave, I got trapped in this cage...

options.name: I trust you! Give me something interesting!

KjPFgeFwia.name: Mysterious cube
KjPFgeFwia.message:
You got in touch with the mysterious cube!



Better known as the wormhole that connects this world with the fourth dimension! Otherworldly beings are willing to exchange attributes for 30 of your levels! Ponder wisely ...

eEAq2zNzTc.name: The greatest fighter of all time
eEAq2zNzTc.message:
Is this the end?



Once again we meet, thank you for your journey! You are of the first fighters that won the tourney. Enjoy your strength, follow the beat! Now you will be rewarded with a special little treat!

options.name: I want it! Give me something!

LeF20EkUZQ.name: Eggman
LeF20EkUZQ.message:
You are talking to the statue of wealth!



Better known as the statue of Eggman, turned into stone after being defeated by the protectors of the treasure island. Each use costs 5 amethysts. Possible results:


Good luck: 35% chance of multipling your current item quantity by 2.

Super expected: 65% chance of multipling your current item quantity by 0.



Useful information: Drinking luck potions will increase your chances of winning items!

options.name: Go on and give me something!
I definitely do not trust Eggman

vi6aiB0maW.name: Game rules
vi6aiB0maW.message:
Community Guide:



Players can get muted for:
1- SPAMMING in the chat.
2- LEAKING / GIVING HINTS to secret codes / hidden features (this includes all codes except the one for the Helmet of Impossibility).
3- BEING TOXIC IN THE CHAT (that includes personal attacks, sexism, threats, racism and sexual discussions).
4- CONSTANTLY BEGGING for giveaways / items / levels.
5- CONTINUOUSLY ANNOYING a member of our staff team.

Players can get kicked for:
1- TRYING TO STEAL AN ITEM THAT IS MEANT TO BE GIVEN TO A MEMBER OF OUR STAFF TEAM OR GIVEAWAY WINNER.
2- ANNOYING a member of our staff team.
3- JOINING A PRIVATE SERVER on purpose or by accident.
4- STAYING ON THE EDGES OF WHAT IS CONSIDERED MUTE WORTHY.
5- EVENT PURPOSES (that includes special boss abilities and hide and seek rounds).

Players can get banned for:
1- CONTINUOUSLY MISBEHAVING after being muted and unmuted multiple times.
2- HAVING AN INAPPROPRIATE / SEXUALLY EXPLICIT USERNAME.
3- CONTINUOUSLY JOINING A PRIVATE SERVER that is being used for an important task.
4- EXPLOITING GLITCHES, CRASHING SERVERS, BOTTING SERVERS or DAMAGING THE GAME in any way (that includes duping items and abusing experience glitches without reporting them to a member of our management team).
5- SHARING MALICIOUS / INAPPROPRIATE LINKS in the chat (that includes pornographic sites, IP grabbers and any kind of NSFW content).

Final warnings:
1- STEALING ITEMS, SCAMMING, AND ANNOYING players that are not part of our staff team is not against the rules.
2- When reporting someone, MENTION ONE MEMBER OF OUR STAFF TEAM THAT IS ONLINE and make sure to provide a SCREENSHOT of the rule breaker SPECIFYING WHICH RULE WAS BROKEN. Making false alarms will get you muted.

This dialogue assumes you are part of our Discord server. Click in the following link in case you are not: Click Here

options.name: Shut up! Let me play the game!

QHWB1bflcH.name: Event Dialogue
QHWB1bflcH.message:
The apocalypse begins



The fighters leave the altar room to find the islands completely in ruins. What being could possibly cause such destruction? It is time!

ZsUat3XU5r.name: Boros
ZsUat3XU5r.message:
You are talking to the statue of Boros!



Better known as the statue of deflagration. Each use costs 5 coals, which will melt 1 quantity of your currently selected item (For instance, 1 Emerald Hammer can be melted into 10 Emeralds).

- Melting items into Emeralds will give you 15M XP.
- Melting items into Diamonds will give you 1M XP.
- Melting items into Iron will give you 500K XP.
- Melting items into Amethysts will give you 250K XP.
- Melting items into Gold will give you 125K XP.
- Failing to melt your item will give you 25K XP.

Warning: be careful with what you wish for.

options.name: I am not putting my stuff in there!
